name: dzgrckzgbzdg
description:
Play as dzgrckzgbzdg!!!!

Yes, that's right, dzgrckzgbzdg.

Traverse the caves and make sure to avoid the spinning blades. who put those there.

Deliver balloons to the hands.

5 Levels !

Multiple (unintended) ways to complete levels!

Mouse - Move hands

Scroll Wheel - Elongate / shrink arm

LMB - Climb

RMB - Grab and let go of balloons

Space - Join hands together and drop

(Title screen says "the end" by accident whoops. Everything else should work fine)
